import React from 'react' import { BtnBbw } from '../../graphics/buttons' import Link from 'next/link' const ArticleBanner = props => { let bannerState = (props.data.cover == null) ? 'relative bg-orange-300 text-gray-900' : 'absolute bottom-0 text-white' let content = (
{(props.data.cover) ? () : null}

{props.data.title}

{props.data.description}
) return content } export default ArticleBanner
